title: a
text: the confidentiality of backup CUI is protected at storage locations

title: a
text: individuals are screened prior to authorizing access to organizational systems containing CUI

title: a
text: a policy and/or process for terminating system access and any credentials coincident with personnel actions is established

title: b
text: system access and credentials are terminated consistent with personnel actions such as termination or transfer

title: c
text: the system is protected during and after personnel transfer actions

title: a
text: authorized individuals allowed physical access are identified

title: b
text: physical access to organizational systems is limited to authorized individuals

title: c
text: physical access to equipment is limited to authorized individuals

title: d
text: physical access to operating environments is limited to authorized individuals

title: a
text: the physical facility where organizational systems reside is protected

title: b
text: the support infrastructure for organizational systems is protected

title: c
text: the physical facility where organizational systems reside is monitored

title: d
text: the support infrastructure for organizational systems is monitored

title: a
text: visitors are escorted

title: b
text: visitor activity is monitored

title: a
text: audit logs of physical access are maintained

title: a
text: physical access devices are identified

title: b
text: physical access devices are controlled

title: c
text: physical access devices are managed

title: a
text: safeguarding measures for CUI are defined for alternate work sites

title: b
text: safeguarding measures for CUI are enforced for alternate work sites
